# An empty 'Modules' means it can't be determined.
#
# 'Special-modules' for M17 reflectors will pass encrypted voice data.
# 'Special-modules' for URF reflectors are fully transcoded.
#
# An empty 'Special-modules' value can mean either:
#   1) If 'Modules' is empty, it can't be determined, or,
#   2) if 'Modules' is NOT empty, there are no special modules.
#
